channel.title: Ab-initio Synthesis of Amino acids
channel.description: Recent content on Ab-initio Synthesis of Amino acids

item.title: Initial Network Setup
item.description: A graph theory based approach has been used in this study, where the nodes represent the atoms and edges represent the covalent bonds between the atoms. The number of bonds that an atom can form is constrained by the valency of the atom.

item.title: Thermodynamic data collection
item.description: All thermodynamic data used in this study was obtained from the RMG web server. The RMG data base is jointly developed by William H. Green’s research group at MIT and Richard H.
